pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, September 27, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Stanley Bridge, Prince Edward Island

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will meet with community members impacted by Hurricane Fiona. Minister of Veterans Affairs and Associate Minister of National Defence Lawrence MacAulay, Member of Parliament for Malpeque Heath MacDonald, and Member of Parliament for Charlottetown Sean Casey will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

Sydney, Nova Scotia

The Prime Minister will meet with community members impacted by Hurricane Fiona in Glace Bay. Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Sean Fraser, Member of Parliament for Sydney—Victoria Jaime Battiste, and Member of Parliament for Cape Breton—Canso Mike Kelloway will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

The Prime Minister will visit the Canadian Coast Guard College. Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Sean Fraser, Member of Parliament for Sydney—Victoria Jaime Battiste, and Member of Parliament for Cape Breton—Canso Mike Kelloway will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage
